text: Harold Huyton "Tim" Francis (1928 - 2 January 2016) was a New Zealand diplomat. He was Permanent Representative to the United Nations from 1978 to 1982. He was also Ambassador to the United States from 1988 to 1991. Francis was born in Auckland. He was married to Sherrah and had three children. Francis died from cancer on 2 January 2016 in Wellington. He was 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Cancer deaths in New Zealand Category:People from Auckland Category:Politicians from North Island
title: Tim Francis
